title: Facebook's Fragile Future
description:
Facebook has just wrapped up the most controversial quarter in its history. It now faces an even biggest test in next week's midterm elections. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg News tech reporter Sarah Frier on the role the social media giant plays in a divided U.S and why no matter who controls Congress, change is not necessarily on its way.
FOLLOW UP
 Sarah's latest report: Zuckerberg’s Bet on Instagram and Video Has Wall Street Support—for Now
You can follow Sarah at: @sarahfrier
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
